name: HUMDLE
description:
This is an adventure game about escape from a dark room.


You can't see the shape of the room.
All you can do is move up, down, left and right.
If you try to move, you will get some hits about where you are.

Sometimes you'll face a dead end.
Go back and find another way! (again and again

Some spaces have certain rules.
If you can find the rule,
It will help to escape.

When you reach the highest point,
you can escape


  • Arrow keys or WASD - Move
  • ESC hold - Quit the game
  • F - Full screen switching

And
You can draw freely on the game screen with your mouse.

  • Left mouse button - Draw
  • Right mouse button - Erase

It can help you a lot to clear the game.
Or, you may not use it. For a difficult game experience,
It's up to you
